title: Chic Summer Outfit Ideas for Every Type of Vacation
description: No gatekeeping—just travel-friendly looks with Prime-level speed.
excerpt: Straight from this fashion editor’s mood board.
text: I don’t even have a trip planned, but the sheer act of writing this story gave me a buzz. That’s how much I love dressing for summer vacation. I’m here to bust the myth that you have to spend a fortune to look good on your getaway. To prove a point, I did a little experiment. The objective was to find ultra stylish, ultra-Instagrammable summer vacation outfits on Amazon. And guess what? I even surprised myself. Below, take inspiration and shoppable cues from my 11 outfit ideas for days when you put on more than just a swimsuit. And if you think I didn’t legitimately order several of these exact looks for myself in the process, guess again. The Bubble Skirt The charming return of bubble skirts was a shock to us all, but suddenly, I can’t get enough. Now is the time to wear your favorite white pieces and all the raffia you can find. Ganni Grapes Logo Cotton T-Shirt Onia Air Linen Bubble Mini SkirtMadewell Hera Mary Jane FlatsCaiyao Resin Irregular Bangle KAMEILONG Nylon Hobo Bag Dressed UpI know the drill: beach bum by day, five-star restaurant for dinner. It’s quite literally what I look forward to all year. On those evenings when you feel like showing up and showing out, I recommend a silky dress. BYETOCE Starfish Pendant NecklaceMOYNOTE Satin One Shoulder Maxi DressCape Robbin Open Toe Lace Up Heels CLUCI Shoulder BagNow 10% OffMax + Stone Layered Cocktail RingResort Vibes ’Tis the season to wear a cover-up as an outfit, and call it a day. Of course, this crochet duo will look incredible over a swimsuit, but don’t let that discourage you from getting creative. The best part about packing coordinating sets is that they can be styled as separates, too. That’s at least three different outfits from just two items. Girl math! Rails x LSpace Paz TopRails x LSpace Maja PantsGTBINGGO Jelly Slides A.L.C. Simone Raffia Bag VANLINKER Oversized Aviator Sunglasses All Black Think you can’t get away with all black in the summer? Au contraire, mon ami. While everyone’s favorite color does attract the sun—and thus can become hotter than its light-hued counterparts—black can be very chic for summer, especially if you’re vacationing somewhere like Paris or New York City. I’m personally obsessed with these tailored Bermuda shorts and this toe-ring sandal. Maison Irem Athens NecklaceSUUKSESS Square Neck Thong BodysuitNow 26% OffThe Drop Stretch Limo Walking Shorts The Drop Camilla Wide Thong Sandal Now 20% OffKate Spade Icon Barrel Bag Now 40% OffGuava Girl Allegedly it’s “guava girl summer” and “sardine girl summer”? It’s hard to keep up, but here’s what you need to know: The hottest trend this season is dress like you’re having fun. And the best way to do that is, yes, to actually have fun with your wardrobe. Guava girls are turning to hibiscus motifs and tropical palettes, while sardine gals are opting for all things fish-shaped (obviously). I think I’m more of the former variety, so here’s my take on a playful guava-inspired ensemble. GQLV Flower Claw ClipsAdidas Tiro Nations Pack Crop JerseyPRETTYGARDEN Maxi Skirt with Pockets Now 11% OffThe Drop Charea Rope SandalHey Harper Gold Hoop Pearl Dangle EarringsLaidback Prep When temperatures are truly oppressive, minimal effort is key. You can never go wrong with a matching set, bonus points if it’s linen. To elevate an otherwise simple look, try adding boat shoes, which offer a nautical touch, and statement accessories. This hat is Kendall Jenner-approved, by the way. Ralph Lauren Adjustable Cap HOTOUCH Boyfriend Oversized Collar ShirtThe Drop Emilie Relaxed Pull-on Linen ShortsThe Drop Monaco Boat Shoe PHILOMENA Beaded Crochet Shoulder BagA Halter & Kitten Heels Among ELLE’s shopping team, we’re collectively obsessed with halter tops for summer. I have at least four in my own rotation. And I’m very into the combo of loose jeans and kitten heels at the moment. I can’t believe I didn’t find this barrel style sooner—it’s basically an exact replica of my favorite $100 pair for less than half the price. Anni Lu Happy NecklaceTankaneo Scoop Halterneck Top Now 15% OffPLNOTME Barrel Jeans Cushionaire Miami Thong Kitten HeelNow 42% OffTory Burch Ella Printed Tote Lowkey Comfort First of all, an Olsen-endorsed sandal for walking? Say less. I’ve never ordered something so fast. For chill afternoons that don’t require getting dolled up or for travel days when you want to be cozy and cute, this ensemble never misses. A flowy pull-on pant and a white tank top will always be a winning recipe. Add a light layer and beachy accessories to taste. perfectwhitetee Blondie Structured Rib Bra Friendly TankLe Bop Camille Pull On Pants Teva Voya Infinity SandalLifeShe Oversized Jean Shacket Ettika Golden Cowrie Shell Choker Neutral Glam Not to be dramatic, but I’m pretty sure I would die for this Simon Miller bag. It’s the only purse I want to use this summer. For the understated icon, this outfit is all about clean girl energy. Freshly washed hair in a slick bun, sun-kissed skin, and a spritz with a view...take me there now. (And P.S., anklets are so in.) Jenni Kayne Natural Stripe Cove Dress Barzel Flat Marina Link Anklet Now 35% OffSimon Miller Shelly BagMonrovia Platform Raffia Espadrilles Now 20% OffBARTOSI Metal Hair Claw ClipPolka Dots By now you’re probably heard that patterns are having a moment this summer—gingham, polka dots, and stripes, namely. I love them all equally, but this darling dress was too cute to ignore, so we’ll stick with spots this time. With a little cardi wrapped around your shoulder in case it gets chilly? Très magnifique. ALYXUY Charm Necklace The Drop Luna Scoop Neck Linen Maxi DressNow 20% OffThe Drop Pepper Ballet FlatNow 39% OffGoody Ouchless Comfort Headbands Balimtoy Cardigan SweaterDenim Shorts I have to show some love to my casual girls, too. After all, not every vacation is sun, sea, and sand. For the urban explorer or mountain mama, summerify your everyday go-tos by adding pops of color. Besides, no suitcase feels complete without a pair of jean shorts. html:
I don’t even have a trip planned, but the sheer act of writing this story gave me a buzz. That’s how much I love dressing for summer vacation. I’m here to bust the myth that you have to spend a fortune to look good on your getaway. To prove a point, I did a little experiment. The objective was to find ultra stylish, ultra-Instagrammable summer vacation outfits on Amazon. And guess what? I even surprised myself.

Below, take inspiration and shoppable cues from my 11 outfit ideas for days when you put on more than just a swimsuit. And if you think I didn’t legitimately order several of these exact looks for myself in the process, guess again.

The Bubble Skirt

The charming return of bubble skirts was a shock to us all, but suddenly, I can’t get enough. Now is the time to wear your favorite white pieces and all the raffia you can find.

Ganni Grapes Logo Cotton T-Shirt

Onia Air Linen Bubble Mini Skirt

Madewell Hera Mary Jane Flats

Caiyao Resin Irregular Bangle

KAMEILONG Nylon Hobo Bag

Dressed Up

I know the drill: beach bum by day, five-star restaurant for dinner. It’s quite literally what I look forward to all year. On those evenings when you feel like showing up and showing out, I recommend a silky dress.

BYETOCE Starfish Pendant Necklace

MOYNOTE Satin One Shoulder Maxi Dress

Cape Robbin Open Toe Lace Up Heels

CLUCI Shoulder Bag

Now 10% Off

Max + Stone Layered Cocktail Ring

Resort Vibes

’Tis the season to wear a cover-up as an outfit, and call it a day. Of course, this crochet duo will look incredible over a swimsuit, but don’t let that discourage you from getting creative. The best part about packing coordinating sets is that they can be styled as separates, too. That’s at least three different outfits from just two items. Girl math!

Rails x LSpace Paz Top

Rails x LSpace Maja Pants

GTBINGGO Jelly Slides

A.L.C. Simone Raffia Bag

VANLINKER Oversized Aviator Sunglasses

All Black

Think you can’t get away with all black in the summer? Au contraire, mon ami. While everyone’s favorite color does attract the sun—and thus can become hotter than its light-hued counterparts—black can be very chic for summer, especially if you’re vacationing somewhere like Paris or New York City. I’m personally obsessed with these tailored Bermuda shorts and this toe-ring sandal.

Maison Irem Athens Necklace

SUUKSESS Square Neck Thong Bodysuit

Now 26% Off

The Drop Stretch Limo Walking Shorts

The Drop Camilla Wide Thong Sandal

Now 20% Off

Kate Spade Icon Barrel Bag

Now 40% Off

Guava Girl

Allegedly it’s “guava girl summer” and “sardine girl summer”? It’s hard to keep up, but here’s what you need to know: The hottest trend this season is dress like you’re having fun. And the best way to do that is, yes, to actually have fun with your wardrobe. Guava girls are turning to hibiscus motifs and tropical palettes, while sardine gals are opting for all things fish-shaped (obviously). I think I’m more of the former variety, so here’s my take on a playful guava-inspired ensemble.

GQLV Flower Claw Clips

Adidas Tiro Nations Pack Crop Jersey

PRETTYGARDEN Maxi Skirt with Pockets

Now 11% Off

The Drop Charea Rope Sandal

Hey Harper Gold Hoop Pearl Dangle Earrings

Laidback Prep

When temperatures are truly oppressive, minimal effort is key. You can never go wrong with a matching set, bonus points if it’s linen. To elevate an otherwise simple look, try adding boat shoes, which offer a nautical touch, and statement accessories. This hat is Kendall Jenner-approved, by the way.

Ralph Lauren Adjustable Cap

HOTOUCH Boyfriend Oversized Collar Shirt

The Drop Emilie Relaxed Pull-on Linen Shorts

The Drop Monaco Boat Shoe

PHILOMENA Beaded Crochet Shoulder Bag

A Halter & Kitten Heels

Among ELLE’s shopping team, we’re collectively obsessed with halter tops for summer. I have at least four in my own rotation. And I’m very into the combo of loose jeans and kitten heels at the moment. I can’t believe I didn’t find this barrel style sooner—it’s basically an exact replica of my favorite $100 pair for less than half the price.

Anni Lu Happy Necklace

Tankaneo Scoop Halterneck Top

Now 15% Off

PLNOTME Barrel Jeans

Cushionaire Miami Thong Kitten Heel

Now 42% Off

Tory Burch Ella Printed Tote

Lowkey Comfort

First of all, an Olsen-endorsed sandal for walking? Say less. I’ve never ordered something so fast. For chill afternoons that don’t require getting dolled up or for travel days when you want to be cozy and cute, this ensemble never misses. A flowy pull-on pant and a white tank top will always be a winning recipe. Add a light layer and beachy accessories to taste.

perfectwhitetee Blondie Structured Rib Bra Friendly Tank

Le Bop Camille Pull On Pants

Teva Voya Infinity Sandal

LifeShe Oversized Jean Shacket

Ettika Golden Cowrie Shell Choker

Neutral Glam

Not to be dramatic, but I’m pretty sure I would die for this Simon Miller bag. It’s the only purse I want to use this summer. For the understated icon, this outfit is all about clean girl energy. Freshly washed hair in a slick bun, sun-kissed skin, and a spritz with a view...take me there now. (And P.S., anklets are so in.)

Jenni Kayne Natural Stripe Cove Dress

Barzel Flat Marina Link Anklet

Now 35% Off

Simon Miller Shelly Bag

Monrovia Platform Raffia Espadrilles

Now 20% Off

BARTOSI Metal Hair Claw Clip

Polka Dots

By now you’re probably heard that patterns are having a moment this summer—gingham, polka dots, and stripes, namely. I love them all equally, but this darling dress was too cute to ignore, so we’ll stick with spots this time. With a little cardi wrapped around your shoulder in case it gets chilly? Très magnifique.

ALYXUY Charm Necklace

The Drop Luna Scoop Neck Linen Maxi Dress

Now 20% Off

The Drop Pepper Ballet Flat

Now 39% Off

Goody Ouchless Comfort Headbands

Balimtoy Cardigan Sweater

Denim Shorts

I have to show some love to my casual girls, too. After all, not every vacation is sun, sea, and sand. For the urban explorer or mountain mama, summerify your everyday go-tos by adding pops of color. Besides, no suitcase feels complete without a pair of jean shorts.

KOFISNI Dangle Hoop Earrings

Dsewpaur Striped Long Sleeve Polo

Levi’s A-Line Shorts

Adidas Grand Court Lo Sneaker

Hue Mini Crew Sock, 6-Pack

Now 25% Off
